Package com.company

Class Airport

java.lang.Object
com.company.Airport
public class Airport
extends java.lang.Object
Controls all flights and passengers transfers.

    • ReceivePassenger

      public void ReceivePassenger​(Passenger passenger) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Receives new passenger and sends him to first free terminal.
      Parameters:
      passenger - passenger to to receive.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if semaphore acquire was interrupted.

    • ReleasePassenger

      public void ReleasePassenger​(Passenger passenger) throws java.security.InvalidParameterException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Releases passenger from airport and frees one terminal.
      Parameters:
      passenger - passenger to remove.
      Throws:
      java.security.InvalidParameterException - if passenger was not registered in airport.
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • RemovePassenger

      public void RemovePassenger​(Passenger passenger)
      Removes passenger from airport. Simulates passenger exit from airport when used from Passenger class.
      Parameters:
      passenger -

    • AddPassenger

      public void AddPassenger​(Passenger passenger)
      Add passenger to airport. Simulates airport enter if called by passenger.
      Parameters:
      passenger -
